item.title: Planisware Soars in Paris Debut After Raising About $300 Million
item.description: Software company Planisware jumped as much as 33% on its trading debut in Paris after raising 278 million euros ($297 million) as France — Europe’s biggest stock market — finally joins the bounce in the region’s share listings after a two-year drought.
